NEW YORK 

Clemson running back C.J PERIOD Spiller rode in his limo with Barry Sanders PERIOD Sanders answered with Spiller when asked about the top running backs in this years draft class PERIOD

Sanders really likes Oklahoma State offensive tackle Russell Okung but admitted he was biased because of his alma mater  also Oklahoma State PERIOD He laughed and said he was glad he didnt have to make the choice between Okung and Nebraska tackle Ndamukong Suh PERIOD

Tennessee safety Eric Berry said Tim Tebow was  hes ever taken PERIOD

Ndamukong Suh said he was nervous but relaxed and spent some of the afternoon playing video games with the other guys invited to the draft PERIOD

Suh rode in the car to the draft with legendary Giants linebacker Lawrence Taylor but wouldnt share the advice Taylor gave him PERIOD

NFL commissioner Roger Goodell said the goal of moving the draft to primetime on Thursday night was to get more people talking about the NFL and football as a whole PERIOD

AJC
